data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: What we can or cannot do, what we consider possible or impossible, is rarely a function of our true capability. It is more likely a function of our beliefs about who we are.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Once you have mastered time, you will understand how true it is that most people overestimate what they can accomplish in a year - and underestimate what they can achieve in a decade!

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: We are the only beings on the planet who lead such rich internal lives that it's not the events that matter most to us, but rather, it's how we interpret those events that will determine how we think about ourselves and how we will act in the future.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: There's always a way - if you're committed.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: I challenge you to make your life a masterpiece. I challenge you to join the ranks of those people who live what they teach, who walk their talk.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: The higher your energy level, the more efficient your body The more efficient your body, the better you feel and the more you will use your talent to produce outstanding results.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Passion is the genesis of genius.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: There's no abiding success without commitment.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Surmounting difficulty is the crucible that forms character.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: We aren't in an information age, we are in an entertainment age.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: One reason so few of us achieve what we truly want is that we never direct our focus; we never concentrate our power. Most people dabble their way through life, never deciding to master anything in particular.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: How am I going to live today in order to create the tomorrow I'm committed to?

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Want to learn to eat a lot? Here it is: Eat a little. That way, you will be around long enough to eat a lot.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: When people are like each other they tend to like each other.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Live with passion!

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: I've come to believe that all my past failure and frustration were actually laying the foundation for the understandings that have created the new level of living I now enjoy.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: It not knowing what to do, it's doing what you know.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you're in control of your life. If you don't, life controls you.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: In life you need either inspiration or desperation.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: The meeting of preparation with opportunity generates the offspring we call luck.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Most people have no idea of the giant capacity we can immediately command when we focus all of our resources on mastering a single area of our lives.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Whatever happens, take responsibility.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals - that is, goals that do not inspire them.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: The truth is that we can learn to condition our minds, bodies, and emotions to link pain or pleasure to whatever we choose. By changing what we link pain and pleasure to, we will instantly change our behaviors.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: It's not the events of our lives that shape us, but our beliefs as to what those events mean.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: For changes to be of any true value, they've got to be lasting and consistent.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: It is not what we get. But who we become, what we contribute... that gives meaning to our lives.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: You see, it's never the environment; it's never the events of our lives, but the meaning we attach to the events - how we interpret them - that shapes who we are today and who we'll become tomorrow.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Remember, a real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: You always succeed in producing a result.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Beliefs have the power to create and the power to destroy. Human beings have the awesome ability to take any experience of their lives and create a meaning that disempowers them or one that can literally save their lives.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: In essence, if we want to direct our lives, we must take control of our consistent actions. It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Success comes from taking the initiative and following up... persisting... eloquently expressing the depth of your love. What simple action could you take today to produce a new momentum toward success in your life?

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: You see, in life, lots of people know what to do, but few people actually do what they know. Knowing is not enough! You must take action.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: If you want to be successful, find someone who has achieved the results you want and copy what they do and you'll achieve the same results.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Take control of your consistent emotions and begin to consciously and deliberately reshape your daily experience of life.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: The way we communicate with others and with ourselves ultimately determines the quality of our lives.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: We will act consistently with our view of who we truly are, whether that view is accurate or not.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: My definition of success is to live your life in a way that causes you to feel a ton of pleasure and very little pain - and because of your lifestyle, have the people around you feel a lot more pleasure than they do pain.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.en: There is no such thing as failure. There are only results.
